modName: Changing Seasons Proof of Concept Test
summary: A Small test to show my custom way of making changing seasons
descriptionHtml:
A Small test to show my custom way of making changing seasons.
so far i only have a small patch on a test island with a tree that changes the seasons every day it goes from spring summer fall and winter terrain and trees .

this is only to show people a way around the changeing mods back and forth method of changing seasons . be Warned it is only in pre alpha dn was not meant to be used in its current state as a gameplay mod.

i only made this mod to show my workaround of changing seasons in skyrim although if it is implemented it might cause heavy fps drop in certain areas until some figures out how to change the extures through script in game instead of changing mods whenever you decide to change seasons
author: Elfendrago
